exmls.content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ButtonSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" alpha.disabled="0.5"
             source="button_up_png"
             source.down="button_down_png"/>
    <e:Label id="labelDisplay" top="8" bottom="8" left="8" right="8"
             size="20"
             textColor="0xFFFFFF" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center"/>
    <e:Image id="iconDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.CheckBoxSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" width.disabledAndSelected="155" height.disabledAndSelected="42">
    <e:Group width="100%" height="100%">
        <e:layout>
            <e:HorizontalLayout verticalAlign="middle"/>
        </e:layout>
        <e:Image fillMode="scale" alpha="1" alpha.disabled="0.5" alpha.down="0.7"                                                                     source="btn_one_choose_bg_png" source.down="btn_one_choose_bg_png" source.upAndSelected="btn_one_choose_hight_png" source.downAndSelected="btn_one_choose_hight_png" source.disabledAndSelected="btn_one_choose_hight_png"/>
        <e:Label id="labelDisplay" size="26"
                 textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
                 fontFamily="Tahoma" textColor.disabledAndSelected="0x286b28" size.disabledAndSelected="26" bold.disabledAndSelected="true" text.disabledAndSelected="枣庄方言" textColor="0x286b28" bold="true" text="枣庄方言"/>
    </e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.HScrollBarSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="8" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="" scale9Grid="3,3,2,2" height="8" width="30" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.HSliderSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="8" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="track" source="track_sb_png" scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="100%"
             height="6" verticalCenter="0"/>
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="thumb_png" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ItemRendererSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" alpha.disabled="0.5"
             source="button_up_png"
             source.down="button_down_png"/>
    <e:Label id="labelDisplay" top="8" bottom="8" left="8" right="8"
             size="20" fontFamily="Tahoma"
             textColor="0xFFFFFF" text="{data}" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.PanelSkin" minHeight="230" minWidth="450" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image left="0" right="0" bottom="0"  top="0" source="border_png" scale9Grid="2,2,12,12" />
    <e:Group id="moveArea" left="0" right="0" top="0" height="45">
        <e:Image left="0" right="0" bottom="0"  top="0" source="header_png"/>
        <e:Label id="titleDisplay" size="20" fontFamily="Tahoma" textColor="0xFFFFFF"
                 wordWrap="false" left="15" right="5" verticalCenter="0"/>
    </e:Group>
    <e:Button id="closeButton" label="close" bottom="5" horizontalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ProgressBarSkin" minWidth="30" minHeight="18" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image source="track_pb_png" scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="100%"
			 height="100%" verticalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Image id="thumb" height="100%" width="100%" source="thumb_pb_png"/>
	<e:Label id="labelDisplay" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
			 size="15" fontFamily="Tahoma" textColor="0x707070"
			 horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.RadioButtonSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Group width="100%" height="100%">
        <e:layout>
            <e:HorizontalLayout verticalAlign="middle"/>
        </e:layout>
        <e:Image fillMode="scale" alpha="1" alpha.disabled="0.5" alpha.down="0.7"
                
                
                
                 source="btn_one_choose_bg_png" source.upAndSelected="btn_one_choose_hight_png" source.downAndSelected="btn_one_choose_hight_png" source.disabledAndSelected="btn_one_choose_hight_png"/>
        <e:Label id="labelDisplay" size="26"
                 textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
                 fontFamily="Tahoma" text="枣庄方言" textColor="0x286b28" bold="true"/>
    </e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ScrollerSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="20" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:HScrollBar id="horizontalScrollBar" width="100%" bottom="0" autoVisibility="false" visible="false"/>
    <e:VScrollBar id="verticalScrollBar" height="100%" right="0" autoVisibility="false" visible="false"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="skins.TextInputSkin" minHeight="40" minWidth="300" states="normal,disabled,normalWithPrompt,disabledWithPrompt" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" source="jrjlb_shurukuang_png"/>
	<e:Rect height="100%" width="100%" fillColor="0xffffff" alpha="0"/>
 	<e:EditableText id="textDisplay" verticalCenter="-1" left="10" right="10"
	                textColor.disabled="0xff0000" width="100%" size="32"  text="" textColor="0xf9e8d5" textAlign="center" restrict="0-9a-zA-Z"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ToggleSwitchSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image source="on_png"
             source.up="off_png"
             source.down="off_png"
             source.disabled="off_png"/>
    <e:Image source="handle_png"
             horizontalCenter="-18"
             horizontalCenter.upAndSelected="18"
             horizontalCenter.downAndSelected="18"
             horizontalCenter.disabledAndSelected="18"
             verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.VScrollBarSkin" minWidth="8" minHeight="20" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="" scale9Grid="3,3,2,2" height="30" width="8" horizontalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.VSliderSkin" minWidth="25" minHeight="30" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="track" source="track_png" scale9Grid="1,1,4,4" width="7" height="100%" horizontalCenter="0"/>
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="thumb_png" horizontalCenter="0" />
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="LodingViewSkin" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" width="1472" height="828">
	<e:Image id="bg_img" x="0" y="0" width="100%" height="100%" source="loding_bg_png"/>
	<e:Group verticalCenter="327" horizontalCenter="0">

		<e:Image y="11" scale9Grid="5,5,2,2" anchorOffsetX="0" width="605" anchorOffsetY="0" height="37" source="bar_0_png" x="0"/>
		<e:Rect id="load_rec" width="596" height="30" y="13" x="5"/>
		<e:Image id="load_img" y="13" anchorOffsetX="0" width="598" anchorOffsetY="0" height="30" rotation="0.09" source="bar_1_png" scale9Grid="0,0,0,0" x="4"/>
		<e:Image id="pro_img" source="ProgressBarTag" x="0" y="13" visible="false"/>
	</e:Group>

</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="ChangeNameAlertSkin" width="390" height="258" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
    <e:Image width="390" height="258" x="0" y="0" source="changeAlertBg"/>
	<e:Label text="修改昵称" x="143" y="36" textColor="0xfca311" size="26"/>
	<e:Image width="350" height="35" y="91" source="changeTiao" x="20"/>
	
	<e:Image id="sureBtn" width="120" height="47" y="177" x="60" source="change_normal"/>
	<e:Image id="canceBtn" width="120" height="47" y="177" x="210" source="change_light"/>
	<e:Label text="确认" x="100" y="191" size="20" touchEnabled="false"/>
	<e:Label text="取消" x="250" y="191" size="20" touchEnabled="false"/>
	<e:Label text="昵称只能输入数字/字母/中文。最多10个字符（5个汉字）" x="18" y="140" size="14" textColor="0x9b6d09" visible="false"/>
	<e:EditableText id="newname" width="348" height="33" text="" x="21" y="94" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" textColor="0x474646" size="25"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="ChangePwdAlertSkin" width="390" height="258" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image width="390" height="258" x="0" y="0" source="changeAlertBg"/>
	<e:Label text="修改密码" x="143" y="15" textColor="0xfca311" size="26"/>
	<e:Image width="304" height="35" y="61" source="changeTiao" x="43"/>
	<e:Image width="304" height="35" y="102" source="changeTiao" x="43"/>
	<e:Image width="304" height="35" y="143" source="changeTiao" x="43"/>
	<e:Image id="sureBtn" width="120" height="47" y="190" x="60" source="change_normal"/>
	<e:Image id="canceBtn" width="120" height="47" y="190" x="210" source="change_light"/>
	<e:Label text="确认" x="100" y="204" size="20" touchEnabled="false"/>
	<e:Label text="取消" x="250" y="204" size="20" touchEnabled="false"/>
	<e:Label text="输入旧密码：" x="43" y="70" size="18" textColor="0x474646"/>
	<e:Label text="新密码：" x="43" y="111" textColor="0x474646" size="18"/>
	<e:Label text="确认密码：" x="43" y="152" textColor="0x474646" size="18"/>
	<e:EditableText id="oldPwd" width="198" height="33" text="" x="145" y="65" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" textColor="0x474646" displayAsPassword="true" size="25" restrict="0-9a-zA-Z"/>
	<e:EditableText id="newPwd" width="240" height="33" text="" x="107" y="105" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" textColor="0x474646" displayAsPassword="true" size="25" restrict="0-9a-zA-Z"/>
	<e:EditableText id="convertNewPwd" width="220" height="33" text="" x="127" y="146" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" textColor="0x474646" size="25" displayAsPassword="true" restrict="0-9a-zA-Z"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="AlertDialogSkin" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Rect id="close_rect" width="100%" height="100%" alpha="0.6"/>
	<e:Group verticalCenter="-93.5" horizontalCenter="-1.5">
		<e:Image id="menu_img" x="0" y="0" touchEnabled="false" source="gamehall_json.charge_bg"/>
		<e:Button id="qd_btn" x="132" y="137.5">
			<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="btnBg_normal" source.down="btnBg_light"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
		<e:Label text="确定" x="156" y="150" size="18" touchEnabled="false"/>
		<e:Label id="des_txt" text="" x="7.5" y="70.5" size="18" touchEnabled="false" width="330" textAlign="center" height="20"/>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="ComBoxItemSkin" width="130" height="25" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Label id="des_txt" text="" x="0" y="3.5" size="18" touchEnabled="false" width="130" textAlign="center" height="18"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="ComBoxSkin" width="130" height="125" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image id="bgImg" x="0" y="25" scale9Grid="5,5,5,5" anchorOffsetX="0" width="130" anchorOffsetY="0" height="100" source="menu_bg"/>
	<e:Group id="combox_grp" x="1" y="0" touchEnabled="true" touchChildren="true" locked="true">
		<e:Image source="gamelog_json.cxlb_bg" x="0" y="0" scale9Grid="5,5,5,5" anchorOffsetX="0" width="130" anchorOffsetY="0" height="25" touchEnabled="false"/>
		<e:Button id="sel_btn" x="106" y="1.5">
			<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="xxan_normal" source.down="xxan_light"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
		<e:Label id="tab_txt" text="" x="11" y="3.5" size="18" touchEnabled="false" width="90" textAlign="center" height="18"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Scroller id="scroller" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" y="25" x="0" width="130" height="100" locked="true">
		<e:List id="table_list" width="100%" height="100%" anchorOffsetY="0" y="-9" x="0" anchorOffsetX="0" locked="true">
			<e:layout>
				<e:VerticalLayout gap="0"/>
			</e:layout>
		</e:List>
	</e:Scroller>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="LobbyViewSkin" width="1472" height="828" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" >
	<w:Config id="166bf8530b5" ></w:Config>
	<e:Image id="bgImg" width="100%" height="100%" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" source="Bg_img_jpg"/>
	<e:Group width="100%" height="96" top="0" horizontalCenter="0">
		<e:Image x="-410" y="-13" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" source="ding_png"/>
		<e:Button id="_set" label="" x="1279.27" y="11" width="136" height="64">
			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="btn_set_0_png" source.down="btn_set_1_png"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
		<e:Button id="_service" label="" x="941.79" y="11" scaleX="1" scaleY="1">
			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="btn_kefu_0_png" source.down="btn_kefu_1_png"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
		<e:Button id="_information" label="" x="1107.75" y="11">
			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="btn_info_0_png" source.down="btn_info_1_png"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
		<e:Image x="514" y="16" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" source="coin_bg_png"/>
		<e:Button label="" x="61" y="2" scaleX="0.9" scaleY="0.9">
			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="head_png" source.down="head_png"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
		<e:Image x="56" y="18" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" source="v_png"/>
		<e:Label id="_head_label" text="中国第一赌神" x="169.5" y="29" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" size="35" fontFamily="KaiTi"/>
		<e:Label id="_coin_label" text="" x="586" y="27" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" size="34" fontFamily="Arial" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" width="180" height="34"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group x="151.67" y="100">
		<e:Image x="0" y="0" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" source="title_bg_png"/>
		<e:Image x="211.33" y="7" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" source="trumpet_png"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group width="100%" height="150" x="0" bottom="0">
		<e:Image scaleX="1" scaleY="1" bottom="0" horizontalCenter="-33" source="di_bg_png"/>
		<e:Button id="_generalize" label="" x="16" y="15.5">
			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="generalize_0_png" source.down="generalize_1_png"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
		<e:Button id="_safebox" label="" x="373.57" y="24.5">
			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="btn_safebox_0_png" source.down="btn_safebox_1_png"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
		<e:Button id="_challenge" label="" x="548.5" y="24.5">
			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="btn_challenge_0_png" source.down="btn_challenge_1_png"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
		<e:Button id="_welfare" label="" x="736" y="24.5">
			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="btn_welfare_0_png" source.down="btn_welfare_1_png"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
		<e:Button id="_shoppingmall" label="" x="946" y="7">
			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="shoppingmall_0_png" source.down="shoppingmall_1_png"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
		<e:Button id="_topup" label="" x="1207" y="9">
			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="topup_0_png" source.down="topup_1_png"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group width="1350" height="500" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0">
		<e:Group width="276" height="500" top="0" x="0">
			<e:Image scaleX="1" scaleY="1" height="100%" anchorOffsetX="0" width="100%" x="0" y="0" source="game_class_bg_png"/>
			<e:Scroller width="100%" height="100%" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" x="0" y="0" scrollPolicyH="off" scrollPolicyV="on">
				<e:Group height="100%" width="100%" anchorOffsetY="0">
					<e:Image source="Bg_dating_qiehuanzhuangshi_png" y="156.27" width="100%" horizontalCenter="0"/>
					<e:Image source="Bg_dating_qiehuanzhuangshi_png" y="260.19" width="100%" horizontalCenter="0"/>
					<e:Image source="Bg_dating_qiehuanzhuangshi_png" y="363.69" width="100%" horizontalCenter="0"/>
					<e:Image id="_btn_wanfa" source="Font_dating_remenwanfa_png" y="56.41" horizontalCenter="0"/>
					<e:Image id="_btn_pk" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="-34" x="7.719999999999992" y="-215.5900000000001" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" source="Font_dating_pukelei_png"/>
					<e:Image id="_btn_mahjong" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="72" x="10.120000000000005" y="43.49000000000001" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" source="Font_dating_majianglei_png"/>
					<e:Image id="_btn_game" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="178" x="6.839999999999996" y="-319.49000000000007" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" source="Font_dating_youxilei_png"/>
					<e:Group id="_dis_wanfa" width="97%" height="130" y="29.83" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" horizontalCenter="0" visible="false">
						<e:Image scaleX="1" scaleY="1" width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="20,11,219,74" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" source="btn_game_bg_png"/>
						<e:Image scaleX="1" scaleY="1" anchorOffsetX="0" width="177.05" anchorOffsetY="0" height="54.48" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" source="Font_dating_remenwanfa1_png"/>
					</e:Group>
					<e:Group id="_dis_pk" width="97%" height="98" y="166.51" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" horizontalCenter="0">
						<e:Image x="0" y="0" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" width="100%" height="100%" source="btn_game_bg_png"/>
						<e:Image source="Font_dating_pukelei1_png" x="51.59" y="21.76" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" anchorOffsetX="0" width="177.05" anchorOffsetY="0" height="54.48"/>
					</e:Group>
					<e:Group id="_dis_mahjong" width="97%" height="98" y="270.42" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" horizontalCenter="0" visible="false">
						<e:Image x="0" y="0" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" width="100%" height="100%" source="btn_game_bg_png"/>
						<e:Image x="51.59" y="21.76" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" anchorOffsetX="0" width="177.05" anchorOffsetY="0" height="54.48" source="Font_dating_majianglei1_png"/>
